pages.title: Aura of Blindness
pages.text: $(l)Aura of Blindness$() is a spell that encircles a $(l:shadowlord)Shadowlord$(). If one steps inside the circle, they will be inflicted with the $(l)Blindness$() effect for 2 seconds. The aura appears as smoke particles rising from the ground around the Shadowlord.$(br)You can negate this effect by wearing a $(l)Gold$() helmet.
